await company.changeSalaryAmount("0x348BB4384a4DB78e9CFb85848d0B43d37AE87f1D", 1000);
await company.changeSalaryFrequency("0x348BB4384a4DB78e9CFb85848d0B43d37AE87f1D", 24);

.exit
